title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 30 October 2013 - XWiki
content:

11:57 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
12:05 <msmeria> has quit  
12:48 <cjd> has quit  
13:12 <sdumitriu> has quit  
13:13 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
14:48 <vmassol> guys, ok for me to upgrade jenkins and  plugins?  
14:49 <vmassol> Doing it in 1 minute barring anyone against it :)  
14:57 <sburjan> Hello gdelhumeau. I wanted to ask you if you intend to rename the workspacetemplate into something more better, since we dropped the notion of workspace now.  
14:57 <gdelhumeau> sburjan: yes, in the new UI I am making, there is no "Workspace" in the document names anymore  
14:58 <sburjan> gdelhumeau: I am talking about the database or in the schema name from the DB  
14:58 <sburjan> AMT we have workspacetemplate and templatee, which are very inconsistent one with each other  
14:58 <gdelhumeau> but I don't have renamed the existing translation keys, which are still called "workspaces.something"  
14:58 <gdelhumeau> oh yes sorry  
14:59 <gdelhumeau> in the future, we won't need a template anymore  
14:59 <gdelhumeau> so there is no name to change ;)  
14:59 <gdelhumeau> I hope you will be able to test if when 5.3M2 will be released!  
14:59 <sburjan> ok, that's cool  
14:59 <gdelhumeau> -if+it  
14:59 <sburjan> I hope that too :)  
15:00 <sburjan> btw, do you know in which page the descriptor of a wiki is found ?  
15:01 <gdelhumeau> XWiki.XWikiServerIdofthewiki  
15:01 <gdelhumeau> for example: XWiki.XWikiServerWorkspacetemplate  
15:01 <gdelhumeau> the first letter of the id is uppercase  
15:02 <tmortagne> sburjan: why don't you look at WikiManager.WebHome ? you have all of them  
15:04 <sburjan> tmortagne: because I need to see it in object mode.  
15:04 <sburjan> and I don't see them in WikiManager.WebHome  
15:04 <sburjan> ah ok, found the page  
15:05 <sburjan> I need to find which of the properties from the object actually correspond to the db name  
15:05 <tmortagne> there is none  
15:06 <tmortagne> it extracted from the page name  
15:06 <tmortagne> and that's the wiki name, the database name can be very different depending on your configuration  
15:09 <sburjan> thanks  
15:09 <sburjan> yes, the db.suffix property from xwiki.cfg  
15:43 <dgenii> has joined #xwiki  
15:48 <dgenii> has quit  
16:11 <camil7> has joined #xwiki  
16:34 <j-simard> has quit  
16:34 <j-simard> has joined #xwiki  
16:58 <vmassol> guys any idea why we get http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-rendering%20Quality%20Checks/387/console  
16:58 <vmassol> ?  
16:59 <vmassol> rendering was doing this too but I restarted the build and it worked: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-rendering/  
16:59 <vmassol> but rendering Quality doesn't seem to work even when triggering the build agzain  
17:00 <tmortagne> vmassol: maybe that's some too recent command for the version of git we have on agents  
17:00 <vmassol> I have updated the jenkins plugins  
17:00 <vmassol> including some git plugin  
17:00 <vmassol> so that could be a reason  
17:01 <tmortagne> yep  
17:01 <vmassol> but strangely the rendering job worked after trigging manually  
17:01 <tmortagne> maybe that command is not always executed  
17:01 <sburjan> has quit  
17:01 <vmassol> or maybe it ran on an agent  
17:01 <vmassol> having a recernt git version  
17:01 <vmassol> \*recent  
17:01 <tmortagne> maybe  
17:01 <vmassol> checking  
17:02 <vmassol> was failing on a11 and is succeeding on a10 now  
17:02 <vmassol> checking their git versions  
17:02 <vmassol> same version  
17:02 <vmassol> 1.7.1  
17:06 <vmassol> ahah  
17:06 <vmassol> running "git config --get remote.origin.url" on a10 and a11  
17:06 <vmassol> if I execute "echo $?"  
17:06 <vmassol> I get 1 on a11 and 0 on a10  
17:07 <vmassol> so that explains the difference, now need to find why  
17:09 <vmassol> ok the reason is a bug in git plugin  
17:09 <vmassol> https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-20258  
17:09 <vmassol> "Confirm prune option is broken in 2.0"  
17:10 <vmassol> from 29 october 2013  
17:14 <vmassol> asking nicolas de loof  
17:19 <evalica> has quit  
17:23 <camil7> has quit

18:38 <j-simard> has quit  
18:44 <vmassol> note: I have rolledback the git plugin on jenkins  
18:44 <vmassol> the prune should work now
